annotations.summary: Patient is experiencing daily severe headaches for the past two weeks.
Headaches are bilateral with tight band sensation around forehead, sometimes extending to back of neck.
Pain severity is usually 6-7 out of 10, sometimes reaching 8.
Headaches triggered by stress and prolonged computer use at work.
No nausea or vomiting but photosensitivity present during severe episodes.
Patient taking ibuprofen 400mg two to three times daily with partial relief.
Patient sleeping only about 5 hours per night due to stress-related insomnia.
High caffeine intake of 4-5 cups of coffee daily.
No vision changes, numbness, or tingling reported.
Family history of migraines in mother.
